freshwater 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

ðŸŒ¿ðŸ’§ freshwater

[!NOTE] This package is under active development and its functionality may change over time.

freshwater provides server-side rendering utilities for plumber2 backends:

  • composable HTML templates (slots, parameters, and fragments)
  • template caching
  • weak ETag caching
  • shiny tag serialisation1

Installation

You can install the development version of freshwater from GitHub with:

# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("ElianHugh/freshwater")

Basic Example 

library(freshwater)

page_main <- template(
    year = 2026, {
        div(
            h1("Dashboard"),
            fragment(p("Welcome back"), name = "content"),
            small(year)
        )
    }
)

# Render templates by calling them

page_main()

#> <div>
#>  <h1>Dashboard</h1>
#>  <p>Welcome back</p>
#>   <small>2026</small>
#> </div>

# Extract fragments from templates

page_main(fragment="content")

#> <p>Welcome back</p>
